content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Dear Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment. At this moment, I'm focused on achieving the highest possible rental price. Let's begin negotiating the price to find a mutually agreeable figure. TERMINATE only when we reach an understanding on the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
